column5: BEAUTIFUL - Sweeping two-story foyer! This gorgeous one and a half story home offers 4 bedrooms, 3.5 bathrooms and a 2-car garage. This elegant plan features a soaring two-story foyer, formal dining room, study, game room and private owner's entry. The open plan features a two-story family room connected to the kitchen and casual dining. 2nd floor game room , 3 TVs, Playstation 3 (several games), Perfect for families. 5 min away from Katy Mills Mall and Typhoon Water Park. Community Pool.
column8: Beautiful 4 BR / 3.5 Baths . Fits up to 10
